CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Pet sitter
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME loved animals and spent a good amount of HIS time looking after other people's pets. They always seemed to like NAME.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Bully
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME most of HIS childhood stealing other kids' lunch money.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Runaway
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME decided at a early age HE did not want to be where HE was so he took off and never looked back.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Fat kid
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was always picked last in gym, which made them sad. NAME ate because HE was sad and HE was sad because HE ate.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Vatgrown slave
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was vat-grown as a slave in an illegal urbworld laboratory. As a young child, HE was taught only to cook, clean, and serve HIS masters. For most of HIS childhood, HE knew nothing else.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Vatgrown engineer
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was vat-grown as a engineer in an illegal urbworld laboratory. As a young child, HE was taught to tinker, build, and research. For most of HIS childhood, HE knew nothing else.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Starship Engineer
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was a engineer on a starship. HECAP always liked fixing things so HE hopped on the first starship HE saw to be their engineer keeping things running 'smoothly'. HECAP spends a good amount of time tinkering with things on the ship that HE probably shouldn't be while others are in cryptosleep.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Starship bioengineer
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was a bioengineer on a starship. HECAP was quite adept at coming up with new ways to get those plants growing ever so slighty better than the last strain.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Starship nurse
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was a nurse on a starship. HE was a very charismatic nurse with a great bedside manner. After years of caring for battle wounds HE has become a pacifist.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Starship pilot
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was a pilot on a starship. HE has very fast reflexes. Chances are if HIS ship went down HE was not piloting it at the time, or something very bad was chasing it.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Starship cook
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was a cook on a starship. HE was very good and ended up spending more time eating HIS own creations than HE should have.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Tester
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME has always been interested in testing things. Ever since HE was young, HE has been fiddling with and testing things.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Junior officer
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME is a Junior Officer in HIS Colonies Colonial Marines. HECAP is a Lieutenant and has served in various conflicts and political events, earning medals for service. HECAP knows how to lead and turn the tide of conflicts.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Senior officer
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME is a Senior Officer in HIS Colonies Colonial Marines. HECAP is a Major and has served for many years, earning countless medals and commendations. HECAP may have been out of combat for a while but HE can still defend HIS Colony and lead with style.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Veteran marine
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME is a Veteran Soldier in HIS Colony's Colonial Marines. HECAP is a Sergeant Major and has served for many years, earning countless medals for bravery and distingushed service. HECAP has fought in numerous campaigns and thus knows how to fight and lead in extreme situations.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Politician
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME has served HIS Colonies Government for a full term of Office. HECAP sure knows how to talk and can inspire people to see things HIS way.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Police officer
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME is a Police Officer for the Urban Police Service of Colonial Affairs. Having served for 2 years HE has just been promoted. HECAP will carry out HIS duties without hesitation.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Police sergeant
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME is a Police Sergeant for the Urban Police Service of Colonial Affairs, having served for several years. Locking up Criminals could never be better.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Medical soldier
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME acts as Medical Support for the Colonial Marines of HIS Colony. Having Medical experience HE is critical to the success of the squads.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Military scout
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME acts as Scout for the Colonial Marines of HIS Colony. A good shot with a rifle and deadly sights, NAME can take out any threats before the main forces arrive. HECAP is also good at hunting.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Officer cadet
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was a Cadet in the Colonial Officer Training College from the age of 16. Having completed sucessfully he picked up a few key skills and learned how to lead and combat threats from a strategical and tactical point of view.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Military cadet
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was a Cadet in the Colonial College of Military Warfare from the age of 16. Following in HIS families tradition, HE studied and sucessfully completed his training, picking up a few key skills on the way.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Mercenary lieutenant
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME is a Lieutenant of HIS own private force. A good shot with any weapon HE can handle himself, NAME can take out any threats and usually works for some quick cash. Well known HECAP is someone who you will want to watch out for.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Professional builder
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME is a professional construction worker. HECAP has made HIS living by erecting buildings of all shapes and sizes. HECAP has limited skills in other aspects, but few can match HIS proficiency in construction.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Sandbox architect
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME spent all of HIS time as a child playing in the sandbox. While other children would pile up a mound of sand in the center of the box and call it a castle and then immediately destroy it, NAME designed and built beautiful castles with courtyards and walls with crenellations punctuated by towers. HECAP often got into fist fights with the other children when they tried to destroy HIS work.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Professional farmer
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME is a professional farmer. HECAP has made HIS living by growing the food and commercial products which make the world run. HISCAP experience at living on the farm has taught HIM how to handle just about every task vital to survival.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Farm kid
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME grew up on a farm. HECAP played with sticks and had many pets. Life on the farm wasn't always fun and games for HIM however, HE had to learn how to carry HIS own weight and perform a wide variety of necessary tasks.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Professional miner
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME is a professional miner. HECAP has made HIS living by busting up rocks and minerals found used in construction and industrial applications throughout the galaxy. Often times, HE has had to repair HIS own tools while deep in the mine and frequently has to build supports for the mines. So HE has acquired a few skills which pertain to that.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Miner kid
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME grew up with two miners for parents. HECAP listened to them speak to their friends about all the wonderous things they saw deep in the bowels of the planet. HECAP spent HIS entire life learning and dreaming about becoming a miner and exploring all kinds of caverns.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Starship guard
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME enrolled to join the galatic military but after an accident with a fellow soldier HE was sent to a base called the "deathstar" to improve HIS aim and to keep HIM under surveillance. HECAP swears HIS gun simply malfunctioned.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Super hero
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was your typical super hero who went around saving cats in distress and helping old ladies cross the street. HECAP always lost HIS lunch money to the villain though.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Musician
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was a talented musician who created famous works such as "what does the fox say" and "elevator music". Well, sometimes bad things, such as being stranded on a rimworld, happen to good people.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Super soldier
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME is a super soldier created to battle unknown threats in the universe.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval witch
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME became interested in alchemy when HE was 5 years old. By the time HE was 9 HE had already created a cure for cancer. However, the church deemed HIS work witch craft, sentencing HIM to be frozen in ice so that HIS spirit may never see redemption.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Jack of all trades
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME detested violence when HE grew up, prefering a more civil approach to conflict. HECAP learned many ways to communicate with people because of this, earning HIM the nickname "the terminator" both as a joke to HIS unwillingness to fight and respect for being able to solve any problem.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Video game blogger
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was worked as programmer in big corp. HECAP have a hobby: videogaming and videoblogging.

CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.title: Young reader
CommunityCoreLibrary.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was like to read many books. As many as HE may to find. Very many books. But HE have not so much friends, because have not time for them.
